title: 109 W Wildey St - Studio
description:
Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #307! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School in Northern Liberties. Unit #307 is a bright Studio 1-bathroom 3rd Floor apartment. Enter into a hallway with high ceilings and cement floors that stretch the full length of the unit. Your living space is spacious and bright, boasting large windows for sunlight and an L-shaped floor plan to easily separate your living room and bedroom areas. The open galley kitchen offers white cabinetry, a gas oven/stove, a refrigerator, and a pantry. Bathroom features include tile flooring, a vanity for storage, a medicine cabinet, and a tiled bathtub. Located in a converted school building that brings a unique mix of old and new. There are FREE laundry rooms in the building, 1 on both the 1st & 2nd floors and 2 on the Penthouse Floor. Schedule a tour today!
Lease Terms:
Available May 1. Generally, the first month, last month, and one-month security deposit are due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Pets are conditional on the owner’s approval and may require an additional fee and/or monthly pet rent, if accepted. (Generally, $500/dog and $250/cat, and/or monthly pet rent). Tenants are responsible for electricity, gas, cable/internet, and water. Water and gas are billed by a 3rd party company, Conservice.
Landlord Requirements:
Applicants to make 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, credit history to be considered (i.e. no active collections), no evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history with on-time rental payments. Exceptions to this criteria may exist under the law and will be considered.
Please reach out at through the listing: https://jg-realestate.com/listing/109-w-wildey-st-307/

This home is centrally located, offering an ease of commute to both Center City and the Suburbs as well as area Universities. The regional rail line is just a few blocks away as well as major access roads. Picturesque Kelly Drive, one of Philadelphia most famous roads that curves beside the banks of the Schuylkill River, is the perfect place to enjoy what Fairmount Park has to offer.

Welcome to 1924 Spruce St! Nestled in the desirable Rittenhouse Square neighborhood, these new fully rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic district. The building has been home to prominent Philadelphia families such as Dr. John Hooker Packard, one of the most prominent American surgeons of the late 19th century; and the Philadelphia lawyer, Earl B. The building holds eight (8) stunning brand-new units offering high-end appliances, including trash compactors, elevator access and lovely views of Center City. title: Looking for a spacious modern home centrally located to center city
description:
Looking for a spacious modern home centrally located to center city and surrounding areas. Blocks away from award winning restaurants and theatres. This stunning 4 floor townhome with over 3,000 square feet of livable space offers an open concept great outdoor space with a patio off the kitchen and a deck off the hallway on 3rd floor, which gives an amazing view of the center city skyline. The interior of the home has 5 bedrooms , 4.5 bathrooms and finished basemen and 2 car garage with additional storage. The entrance to the home is accessed from a private walk -way off of 15th St. or from the garage . Step inside and you are greeted by luxurious amenities and stylish finishes . The foyer is nicely tiled with to the left is a full bedroom and bath , closet , entrance to basement and access to the garage. Walk up the stairs to the 2nd floor where you are greeted with an open floor plan of your main living space which consist of your living room, gourmet kitchen with beautiful black quartz counter tops and backsplash, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher , refrigerator ,walk-in pantry, formal dining room, powder room and patio. Head upstairs to the 3rd floor where you will find the master suite with an amazing walk- in closet 4 piece bathroom, soaking tub, stall shower, double vanity, dual flush toilet and two windows to take in the bright natural light of the sun. At the rear of the hallway sits bedroom #3. Head up to the 4th floor and you will find two more bedrooms and a hall bath, laundry room , storage space and deck that over looks the center city skyline. The basement is fully finished with full bathroom , very high ceilings, great for entertaining, gym or private living quarters. The two car garage has two entrances one leading directly into foyer and one that leads to basement. Truly a must see!
1426 Kenilworth St

title: 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath townhome For rent
description:
Don't miss 2033 Manton Street, a contemporary 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath townhome located in Point Breeze with great amenities! Enjoy hardwood floors, central air, a finished basement, in-home laundry, plus not one but two outdoor spaces! The main level of the home has an open concept layout with a nicely sized living area that connects to the modern kitchen in the back. Cooking is easy here as there are granite countertops, lots of cabinet space and stainless steel appliances including a built-in microwave, gas range, dishwasher, and garbage disposal. Additionally, there is a convenient powder room and access to the private back patio that is perfectly suited for relaxing in the warmer months. The three bedrooms are each nicely sized with windows and ample closet space for storage. To add, the primary bedroom has its own balcony that boasts lovely views of the Center City skyline! The full bathrooms are spacious with natural tiling and upscale granite vanities. Finally, don't miss the fully finished basement that offers another great space for entertaining, a home office, and more! Beyond the wonderful home itself, you'll enjoy being in walking distance to many great restaurants in Point Breeze, including American Sardine Bar, Chick's and Dock Street Brewery. *Sorry, no pets

title: 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath townhome For rent
description:
Don't miss 2033 Manton Street, a contemporary 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath townhome located in Point Breeze with great amenities! Enjoy hardwood floors, central air, a finished basement, in-home laundry, plus not one but two outdoor spaces! The main level of the home has an open concept layout with a nicely sized living area that connects to the modern kitchen in the back. Cooking is easy here as there are granite countertops, lots of cabinet space and stainless steel appliances including a built-in microwave, gas range, dishwasher, and garbage disposal. Additionally, there is a convenient powder room and access to the private back patio that is perfectly suited for relaxing in the warmer months. The three bedrooms are each nicely sized with windows and ample closet space for storage. To add, the primary bedroom has its own balcony that boasts lovely views of the Center City skyline! The full bathrooms are spacious with natural tiling and upscale granite vanities. Finally, don't miss the fully finished basement that offers another great space for entertaining, a home office, and more! Beyond the wonderful home itself, you'll enjoy being in walking distance to many great restaurants in Point Breeze, including American Sardine Bar, Chick's and Dock Street Brewery. *Sorry, no pets

title: Beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista
description:
Welcome to Carriage Mews, a beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista and the Meredith School Catchment, offering 1-car garage parking and a quiet shared courtyard. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, extra wide townhome has been nicely updated and maintained throughout the years. Enter directly through the garage to the first floor featuring an open kitchen and dining area, a large pantry, a conveniently located half bath and a coat closet. The updated kitchen with newer stainless-steel appliances, quartz countertops, a nicely tiled backsplash, gas cooking, and an island for additional storage and counterspace. The spacious dining room (could also double as additional living space) features a wood burning fireplace and glass siding doors overlooking the beautiful well-manicured courtyard. Up the stairs is an oversized living room with hardwood floors, built-in cabinets, a ceiling fan and a large storage closet. This floor also features two nicely sized bedrooms both with closets and great natural light, a laundry closet, and a full bathroom with a tub. Continue up to the beautiful primary bedroom with south facing sliding glass doors to the Juliette Balcony, a wall of closets and access to your private bathroom with a tub and stall shower. Off the bedroom is a bonus living space and additional closets, great for a home office, playroom or an additional lounging area. Lastly, exit out to the private deck with tree top views, perfect for relaxing with a good book. Many recent updates: new Anderson doors & noise cancelling windows (2019), HVAC (2021), washer & dryer (2017), kitchen appliances (2019), and more! Plenty of storage throughout the home as well as in the garage. Located on a quiet street just off Cianfrani Park. Quick walk to Whole Foods, ACME, the Italian Market and some of the city’s best restaurants. Immediate move-in available.
705-11 Pemberton St #711

title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bath End Row Townhouse for Rent!
description:
Exceptionally renovated from top to bottom and elegant throughout, this home features open concept living, and great entertaining space. The home experience begins as you enter the living room into an open concept design. The huge living room features high end engineered hardwood floors and sliding door leading to a covered balcony with a storage shed. The beautiful kitchen is a showstopper featuring stainless steel appliances, high end quartz counter-tops, and exceptionally design backslash. Next to the kitchen is a dining room with enough space to entertain your guests. As you continue your tour you can't help but notice the beautifully finished bathrooms and master bedroom with large walk in closet. Master bathroom is specious and features walk in shower and conveniently located stackable full size washer and dryer. This house has also another nice size bedroom and a hallway bathroom with high end fixtures encompassing an incredibly unique design featuring ceramic tiles. This desirable community is conveniently located near plenty of restaurants and shopping and in proximity to Tyler State Park, Northampton Country Club and Bucks County Community College. Award winning Council Rock School District adds to the value of this house. First, last and one month security deposit required at signing of lease. One small dog under 40lbs allowed, no cats. Non smokers.
Schedule your showing today!!

title: 1-bedroom 3rd fl apartment in historic home
description:
THE APARTMENT AND COMPANY:
1-bedroom apartment in Germantown near Germantown Ave on E Penn St. The Wister Train Station (Chestnut Hill East Line) is about 5 blocks away with quick access to Center City (about 12 minutes), the Airport Line, and other regional train lines. 1/2 block from bus 23.
The apartment will be ready for a May 15th move-in. This is the preferred date, but could go as late as June 1st.
Apartment is on the 3rd floor in a 4-unit historic house. There is no elevator.
The room you see in the photos with the more slanted ceilings is the bedroom. The living room and kitchen are one combined room.
The price includes water and gas. Tenants are responsible for their own electric. The heat is gas, so is paid by the landlord.
There are a few closets in the apartment and no storage in the rest of the building.
Laundry is coin-operated, in the basement, shared with the tenants of the other three apartments.
There is a large yard for all tenants to share.
Pets are ok, small refundable deposit required.
No smoking.
We are a small company, management and owners all live close by in Germantown. Maintenance and repairs are done with independent contractors, there are no employees on call.
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR:
We always prefer to rent to folks who are already part of the community, so if you're in Germantown, we'd love to keep you here.
We look for income to be 3 times the amount of rent, because we want to know that you can afford it. So here that would mean income of around $3075/month.
We want tenants who will be considerate of their neighbors in terms of sound and how they use the space. We ask for a reference from a previous landlord so that we can find out about past experience.
Please be familiar with the area before expressing your interest. It is up to you to determine "how the neighborhood is," "is it safe?" etc. These are personal questions I can't answer for you. Personally I've lived in this area quite a while now; I love it and I feel safe. You may be different.
INSTRUCTIONS:
If this sounds like you, please send a message. You will be asked to fill out a *brief* application prior to the scheduling of a showing. Know that we do not waste time showing our apartments to as many people as possible. So if you meet the criteria and you fill out the application, you are not wasting your time. There is no application fee.

title: large 1BR off UPenn
description:
Charming one bedroom just 2 blocks from Penn’s campus.  This on the 3rd floor of an 1862 historic brownstone.  Apartment is the entire 3rd floor - 3 rooms, plus the bath.  It is a "mother-in-law suite" - you would share a common staircase with tenants that live in the 4 bedroom house on the 1st and 2nd floors.  The space is private and the door locks.  Kitchen is modern with dishwasher and garbage disposal.  Hardwood floors and tons of natural light throughout!  Private laundry and storage space in basement.
Utilities not included, however, the apartment has its own gas hot water heater and gas boiler so you pay for what you use.  We own and manage the building and are on-call all the time.  This is not run by a management company.
